## assertNotTestId() function

Asserts that an element identified by a test ID (`data-testid=` attribute) is not present in the passed page or frame.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function assertNotTestId(page: Page, testId: string, { timeout, message }?: TimeoutOptions): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  page | Page | puppeteer page object. |
|  testId | string | The test ID to look for. |
|  { timeout, message } | [TimeoutOptions](./pentf.timeoutoptions.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Example


```javascript
await assertNotTestId(page, 'foo', {message: 'Expected Test ID "foo" to not be present'});

```
